ABOUT US

Consumer Attorneys LLP is one of the top consumer
protection law firms in the United States.

We file lawsuits on behalf of consumers in federal courts nationwide to clean up their credit and background reports, challenge misleading debt collection letters and innovate effective solutions to many consumer finance problems. We specialize in uncovering mixed files, assisting victims of identity fraud and correcting inaccuracies in credit reports to help people get employment, housing and credit card financing.
